BaseTask

class babydragon.tasks.base_task.BaseTask[source]

Bases: object

A class to encapsulate base tasks and handle rate-limited multi-threaded execution.

Parameters:

  • path (List[List[int]]) –

  • max_workers (int) –

  • task_id (str) –

  • calls_per_minute (int) –

  • backup (bool) –

  • save_path (str) –

task_id

A unique identifier for the task.

Type:

str

path

A list of lists containing the paths of sub-tasks.

Type:

list

results

A list to hold the results of the sub-tasks.

Type:

list

max_workers

The maximum number of worker threads to spawn.

Type:

int

parallel

A flag to determine if tasks should be executed in parallel or not.

Type:

bool

rate_limiter

A rate limiter object to control the rate of execution.

Type:

RateLimiter

failed_sub_tasks

A list to keep track of failed sub-tasks.

Type:

list

backup

A flag to indicate whether to save results as backup or not.

Type:

bool

save_path

The path to save the results file.

Type:

str

__init__(path, max_workers=1, task_id='task', calls_per_minute=20, backup=True, save_path=None)[source]

Construct a new ‘BaseTask’ object.

Parameters:

  • path (List[List[int]]) – A list of lists containing the paths of sub-tasks.

  • max_workers (int) – The maximum number of worker threads to spawn (default is 1).

  • task_id (str) – A unique identifier for the task (default is “task”).

  • calls_per_minute (int) – The maximum number of calls that can be made per minute (default is 20).

  • backup (bool) – A flag to indicate whether to save results as backup or not (default is True).

  • save_path (str) – The path to save the results file.

_save_results_to_file()[source]

Save the results to a JSON file.

The file is saved in the path specified by ‘self.save_path’ with a name based on the task ID.

Return type:

None

_load_results_from_file()[source]

Load results from a JSON file.

The file is loaded from the path specified by ‘self.save_path’ with a name based on the task ID.

Return type:

None

_execute_sub_task(sub_path)[source]

Execute a sub-task and return the results.

Parameters:

sub_path (List[int]) – A list containing the path of the sub-task.

Returns:

A list containing the results of the sub-task.

Return type:

List[str]

execute_task()[source]

Execute the main task and handle errors.

The results are saved to a file if ‘self.backup’ is True.

Return type:

None

work()[source]

Execute the task and return a sorted list of results.

Returns:

A list of tuples. Each tuple consists of a task index and the corresponding result.

Return type:

List[Any]
